list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: form (fabric or a fabric item) by interlacing long threads passing in one direction with others at a right angle to them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: textiles woven from linen or wool
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dệt may dệt từ vải lanh hoặc len

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (a complex story or pattern) from a number of interconnected elements.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta dệt những mảnh đất đầy màu sắc, điện ảnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: twist and turn from side to side while moving somewhere in order to avoid obstructions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had to weave his way through the crowds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh phải dệt theo cách của mình thông qua đám đông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a particular style or manner in which something is woven.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: scarlet cloth of a very fine weave
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vải đỏ tươi của một kiểu dệt rất mịn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hairstyle created by weaving pieces of real or artificial hair into a person's existing hair, typically in order to increase its length or thickness.
